name: photo-of-the-day-you-cant-stop-the-music-in-nashville
title: Photo Of The Day: You Can’t Stop The Music In Nashville [Flood 2010]
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded: It’s been a long weekend for us here in Nashville, and we’re pretty overwhelmed by all the photos and videos of your homes and neighborhoods that you guys are sending us. Cleanup won’t be easy or cheap, but this photo is a great reminder of what makes our city great. [via @prodigaljohn]
